_comment: This file is only for local development pursposes and does not get deployed when you deploy this project in Azure Function Environment. Use it only if you wanna get a fell locally

Values.SourceCosmosDB: <Your connection string to your Monitored Container database account here>
Values.TargetCosmosDB: <Your connection string to your Target Container databse account here>
Values.EndPoint: <your Target Container's database account endpoint uri here>
Values.AuthKey: <your Target Container's database account key here>
Values.queueName: your storage emulator queue name here
